PasswordInstruction.descriptionPoints: of at least six characters and at most 99 characters. This is the shortest password you want your users to be able to set. Amazon Cognito passwords can be up to 256 characters in length.
PasswordInstruction.secondDiscription: Your users must create a password that
PasswordInstruction.nextParaSecondLine: of the following types of character.
PasswordInstruction.speacialCharacterPara: from the following set. A non-leading, non-trailing space character is also treated as a special character.
